main event: Residents of Islip Terrace, New York, reported sightings of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) on October 11, 1967.
interesting points: Witnesses observed the object moving at a slow speed before it suddenly accelerated and disappeared., The object glowed before its rapid departure., Residents described the object as disc-shaped, bright white, and about 20 feet in diameter., The sightings were noted to have occurred over backyards, suggesting multiple witnesses., A detailed questionnaire for further information was requested by the USAF to properly investigate the sightings.
witness description: residents with a considerable knowledge of aviation
